stories.title: Foundation & Background
stories.description: Fix font issue (use drei built-in font), remove broken imports. Add deep gradient background (#0a0a1a → #1a0a2e), reduce particles to ~200 with subtle twinkle
stories.verify: npm run dev runs without errors, background looks premium

stories.title: Clean 3D Scene & Cards
stories.description: Simplify lighting (soft ambient + purple/cyan accents), remove bloom, closer camera, disable orbit. Beautiful glass cards with glowing edges, readable white text, gentle float
stories.verify: Scene is clean, cards look premium

stories.title: Rapid Flip Shuffle Animation
stories.description: On shuffle: cards merge to center into ONE card. Card flips rapidly through all options (text cycles), slowing exponentially over 3.5s. Stops on random winner
stories.verify: Shuffle shows exciting rapid flip animation

stories.title: Winner Celebration
stories.description: Winner card: golden glow pulse, scale up 1.2x with spring, particle burst (gold+purple sparkles). Other options fade in smaller around winner
stories.verify: Winner reveal is satisfying and celebratory

stories.title: Modern Input Panel
stories.description: Glass panel with blur, pill-shaped input with glow on focus, circular add button, option chips with stagger animation, gradient 'Let the vibes decide' button with pulse

stories.title: Result Overlay
stories.description: Semi-transparent overlay, large gradient winner text (gold→amber) with shimmer effect, glass style buttons ('Spin again' + 'New vibes'), scale+fade entry animation

stories.title: Smooth Transitions
stories.description: Panel fades during shuffle, smooth state changes between input/shuffle/result, graceful reset animation, disable interactions during animations

stories.title: Mobile & Final Polish
stories.description: Responsive layout for mobile, touch-friendly buttons, optimize Three.js performance, fix any visual bugs, ensure npm run build succeeds
stories.verify: npm run build succeeds, works on mobile
